thread.title: Carolina Kia adds new comparison page to website
thread.title_full: Carolina Kia adds new comparison page to website

author: admin
title: Carolina Kia adds new comparison page to website
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/21/2015 @ 2:14 PM   Carolina Kia 
HIGH POINT, N.C., Oct. 21, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- In order to help improve its customers' car buying experience, Carolina Kia is providing them with a helpful new Kia comparison portal . This page allows drivers to see how the Kia vehicles that Carolina Kia sells compare to their counterparts from other manufacturers. While the page is still relatively new and Carolina Kia is working on developing more vehicle comparisons, there are a few on the site already for the 2016 Kia Forte, Optima, Sorento, Soul and Sportage. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151021/279172 
When creating new comparison pages, Carolina Kia makes sure to compare vehicles that are similar to one another. SUVs are compared to SUVs, compact cars are compared to compact cars, etc. One newly redesigned vehicle is the 2016 Kia Sorento, which has several popular competitors including the 2016 Hyundai Santa Fe and the 2016 Ford Explorer . Some aspects of the 2016 Sorento that appeal to customers the most include the passenger and cargo volumes, the affordable starting price, all-wheel drive capability and fuel economy numbers. 
Another vehicle that has just received a makeover for the new model year that many drivers have been researching is the 2016 Kia Optima. With the 2016 Kia Optima vs 2016 Nissan Maxima comparison page, future customers can easily see what differs between the two vehicles as well as what similarities they have. 
As new vehicles continue to be developed and released, Carolina Kia will be sure to update its comparison portal to keep drivers informed on all of the latest vehicle comparisons. 
Anyone interested in learning more about the new Carolina Kia comparison portal should contact the dealership either by calling 888-980-9494 or on its website, www.carolinakia.com . 
Media Contact: Rodney Shue, Carolina Kia, 888-980-9494, rodneyshue@yahoo.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Carolina Kia
